Talk01_03_01:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Shooting stars obviously come from the
sky, right? So if <clr:0000>I could fly up there<clr:ffff>, I'd
be able to find a lot of them!
<snd:LaughS_00>Heh, flying through the sky, catching
<clr:0000>shooting stars<clr:ffff>. Now that's a treasure-
hunter's dream!
Talk01_02_00:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>I mentioned before that I'm hunting for a
<clr:0000>shooting star<clr:ffff>, right?

Recently, another traveler told me how
they almost got their hands on one!

They'd spotted the star sailing through
the sky one night, but when they followed
it to where it landed, monsters attacked!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Though they eventually chased the
monsters off, they didn't reach the place
the star had landed until the sun was up.
<snd:Ease_01>By then, the <clr:0000>shooting star was nowhere to
be seen<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>So fleeting, just like the voe of my
dreams. If you see something worth
chasing, don't hesitate, right?
Guardian00: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL>What are you doing?! <sp:5:1:0>You need to flee!
Talk01_02_01:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Recently, another traveler told me how
they almost got their hands on a
<clr:0000>shooting star<clr:ffff>.
When they reached the spot where it had
landed, dawn had already come, and the
<clr:0000>shooting star was nowhere to be seen<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>So fleeting, just like the voe of my
dreams. If you see something worth
chasing, don't hesitate, right?
AssassinClothes: That look is in bad taste.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>That was no joke!<sp:5:0:0> I let my mind wander
for one moment, and they struck...
Talk02_00:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>As a legendary treasure hunter, I am more
than happy to share some tips with you.

The key to making new discoveries is
being able to get somewhere <clr:0000>high up<clr:ffff>!

A cliff, ruins that have fallen from the
sky... As long as it's high up, it'll work
just fine.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>So get high up and look around—you're
bound to discover all kinds of things!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Tired_01>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> That was close.<sp:5:1:0> Feels like I was
one wrong move away from the grave.
Talk02_01:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Making new discoveries is all about being
able to get somewhere <clr:0000>high up<clr:ffff>!

A cliff, ruins that have fallen from the
sky... As long as it's high up, it'll work
just fine.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>So get high up and look around—you're
bound to discover all kinds of things!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>I've got to give you a little something for
saving me, right?<sp:5:0:0> Hope this helps.
Talk99:
<snd:Notice_00>Oh! Are you a traveler? You don't look
like any traveling merchant I've ever
seen before...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_01>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> I admit, that had me sweating.<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe I'm losing my touch.
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Look at you, swooping to save me in the
nick of time all over again.<sp:0:4:0>Here, take this as thanks for helping me.
I'm sure you'll like it!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Sarqso for the help!<sp:5:0:0> That could have gone
badly if you hadn't turned up.
Thanks02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Well, it looks like you saved me again!<sp:5:0:0>
I can't let you go without a reward, can I?<sp:5:0:0>
Here you go.
Talk03_00:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>As a legendary treasure hunter, I am more
than happy to share some tips with you.

If you can reach a place that is really high
up, you can see a lot, right? That makes it
easy to pick your next destination.
<snd:Happy_00>Maybe you want to explore some <clr:0000>strange
area<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>some ruins<clr:ffff>? Or maybe you want
to clear out a <clr:0000>monster outpost<clr:ffff>?
Hyrule is a vast land with much to explore,
and if you've got a destination picked out,
you're in good shape.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I wish I had a map that I could <clr:0000>mark my
destinations<clr:ffff> on...

But recent events have really changed the
landscape. I doubt any of the <clr:0000>maps<clr:ffff> we
used to use are accurate anymore.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>Are we already monster free? <sp:5:0:0>Good.
What a pain in the neck.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sa'oten!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe a monster got the
better of me. <sp:5:0:0>How frustrating...
Talk00_00:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>Lately I've been really interested in the
<clr:0000>rubble and stones falling from the sky<clr:ffff>.

I've even been dreaming about them!<sp:5:1:0>
My latest dream? Hmmm...

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>This big stone came tumbling out of the
sky and hit the ground and then suddenly
started to <clr:0000>float back upward<clr:ffff>.
I grabbed on to it, and before I knew it, I
had arrived at an island in the sky, full of
treasure. Can you imagine?!
Anyway, that was basically the whole
dream. <sp:5:1:0>Too good to be true, of course.

Why would I dream about a falling stone
flying back up into the sky? Dreams are
so strange.
Talk03_01:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>If you can reach a place that is really high
up, you can see a lot, right? That makes it
easy to pick your next destination.
Maybe you want to explore some <clr:0000>strange
area<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>some ruins<clr:ffff>? Or maybe you want
to clear out a <clr:0000>monster outpost<clr:ffff>?
Hyrule is a vast land with much to explore,
and if you've got a destination picked out,
you're in good shape.
<snd:Happy_01>It would be nice to have a map that I
could <clr:0000>mark my destinations<clr:ffff> on. Oh well!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Even if it looks weak, a monster's still a
monster. <sp:5:0:0>You've always got to stay on
your guard!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>Owww...<sp:5:0:0> Those blasted monsters never
pull their punches, do they?<sp:5:1:0> But someday,<sp:5:0:0>
I swear I'll get my revenge.
GoodBye00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>The name's Calisa! I'm a legendary
treasure hunter of the Gerudo. Nice to
meet you!
Have you heard about the strange
phenomena going on all over the
regions of Hyrule?
<snd:Happy_01>Islands floating in the sky and caves
opening up everywhere... It's a dream
come true for a treasure hunter!
Talk00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you think there actually is treasure
where those <clr:0000>stones that fall from the sky<clr:ffff>
come from?
After all, I had that dream about a stone
that returned to the sky...

Heh, I'd cling to a stone if it meant
treasure was waiting at the other end
of the trip!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Work_01>"Don't worry, I can handle this alone!"<sp:5:0:0>
Ha, I wish.<sp:5:0:0> I'm glad you're here!
ClearTerrorEnemy: If I were in my prime...
GoodBye01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>The work of a dedicated treasure hunter
never ends, and I wouldn't have it any
other way!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Think_00>When I was young, I used to eat monsters
like these for breakfast! <sp:5:0:0>How'd I let my
skills get so rusty?!
Talk01_01_00:
You could call me a treasure hunter, of
sorts. I'm after a special treasure right
now, in fact...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:LaughS_01>A shooting star!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>If you travel the roads at night, you'll
sometimes see a streak of light falling
in the distance.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I've heard stories that those are actually
<clr:0000>shooting stars<clr:ffff> that might hit the ground,
but I haven't found one myself yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>It seems like they're about as rare as the
voe of my dreams.

Oh, sorry.<sp:5:1:0> "Voe" is the Gerudo word
for "man."

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, I'm not going to just sit around
waiting for either one to come to me. I
won't find them unless I keep looking!
Talk01_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm obsessed with chasing down one of
those nighttime shooting stars.

I've heard stories that the streaks of light
in the night sky are shooting stars that
can hit the ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But I can't just sit around waiting for
one to come to me. I have to look for it
and the voe of my dreams!
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I just got beaten up...<sp:5:1:0> I'm not exactly
feeling talkative right now.
Talk01_03_00:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>I mentioned before that I'm hunting for a
<clr:0000>shooting star<clr:ffff>, right?

I'm not just wandering around, hoping to
stumble on one, you know. I've thought
about where they come from.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01>I mean, they obviously come from the sky,
right? And if that's the case...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Then if you somehow could fly up into
the sky, you'd be able to find a lot of
<clr:0000>shooting stars<clr:ffff>!
<snd:Think_01>I haven't thought of a way to fly up
there yet though. I'm still working
on that part.
Talk100:
I'd better get going, but I hope we meet
again!<sp:5:0:0> Sav'orq!
